meanings.definition: To bring up and flow out again
meanings.sent1: The bird regurgitates food to feed its chicks.
meanings.sent2: After eating, the cow regurgitates its food to chew it again.
meanings.sent3: The fountain regurgitates water in a never-ending cycle.
meanings.sent4: The volcano regurgitates molten lava, creating new land.
meanings.sent5: The dishwasher regurgitates soap bubbles during the rinse cycle.

meanings.definition: To repeat without understanding or absorbing
meanings.sent1: During the exam, he regurgitates facts without truly learning them.
meanings.sent2: The parrot regurgitates phrases it hears without comprehension.
meanings.sent3: The robot regurgitates instructions without processing their meaning.
meanings.sent4: The tape recorder regurgitates the same song on repeat.
meanings.sent5: The student regurgitates the teacher's words without grasping the concepts.

meanings.definition: To give back or repeat (information) without understanding or absorbing
meanings.sent1: The politician regurgitates the same speech at every rally.
meanings.sent2: The chatbot regurgitates pre-programmed responses to user queries.
meanings.sent3: The parrot regurgitates jokes it heard without getting the punchline.
meanings.sent4: The echo regurgitates the sound of footsteps in the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The internet regurgitates viral memes until they lose their charm.
